instruction: Evaluate the usability of a given app.
output: Evernote is a great app for anyone looking to become more organized. It is user-friendly and allows users to easily capture ideas and tasks, store information and documents, and collaborate with colleagues. It has a simple, intuitive design with intuitive navigation, and its powerful search function makes it easy to find any information you need. Overall, Evernote is an excellent tool for staying organized and productive.
